p: In Supplementary Table 3 the relations between ACSS thresholds A-F and the overall clinical assessment by the investigator and the patient or the dynamics domain (ACSS) are calculated for sensitivity (95% CI), specificity (95% CI), Youdens Index, positive and negative predictive values (95% CI), positive and negative likelihood ratios, and diagnostic odds ratio for visits 3 and 4; the corresponding ROC curves are shown in Supplementary Figs. 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6.
